EmailTemplate.description: Email to CS customer who's getting an additional CS share
EmailTemplate.name: CA - Additional CS share
EmailTemplate.subject: More solar?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi (NAME),
We just added another Community Solar Share to your BlueWave account.
What changes? You'll see another line item on your bill for this new share, and more savings, of course.
- Thanks from all of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Solar 111 Huntington Ave, Suite 650 Boston, MA 02199
Questions or concerns about solar? Call us at 844.768.4100 Email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
